column1: Wine and Chain - Guest Outreach Tracker
Subject: Guest Opportunity: Wine and Chain Podcast
I'm Torrey — I host Wine and Chain
column2: a weekly podcast where my wife Jill (winemaker at Cambria Estate) and I explore the intersection of wine and crypto.

column1: We go live every Wednesday at 3 PM PST
column2: streaming from our vineyard. Jill teaches wine; I bring the crypto alpha. Our audience is growing fast at the exact intersection of wine tokenization

column1: We're booking guests for Season 1 (launching May 2025) and would love to have you on to discuss [specific topic].
The format is conversational — 15-20 minutes on camera
column2: live or pre-recorded. We handle all the tech; you just bring your expertise.

column1: Interested? Let's find a time that works.
